#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb          emplace_back
#define TEST        long t,T;cin>>T;for(t=1;t<=T;t++)
#define X           first
#define Y           second

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
#ifdef DEBUG
    //freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    //freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    
    TEST
    {
        int x,n;
        cin>>n;
        map<int, int> c;
        for(int i=0 ; i<n ; i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            c[x]++;
        }
        
        for (std::map<int,int>::iterator it=c.begin() ; it!=c.end() ; ++it)
        {
            if(it->Y==1)
            {
                cout<<it->X<<"\n";
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    
    
    
}
